DateText: 11th century AH/AD 17th century-13th century AH/AD 19th century
Title: Bahram Chubinah Defeats Khusraw Parviz in Combat
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper
Description: On this folio from Waltesr manuscript W.603, Bahram Chubinah defeats Khusraw Parviz in combat.
Keywords: Islamic; Persian; Safavid; Qajar; Book; Codex; Illumination; Illustration; Manuscript; Iran; History; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Firdawsi (Persian, died 411-416 AH/AD 1020-1025)
